forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 68, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 85. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 64. Northwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Sunny, with a high near 87. West wind 3 to 8 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
